title: Timeless treasure
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/International relations and culture
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/International relations and culture
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Cultural relativism
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Culture - Social aspects
description: Deals with the continual deterioration and destruction of man's cultural heritage and the need for active preservation. Shows rebuilding and restoration work, and discusses the role of UNESCO's International Study Centre for the Restoration and Preservation of Cultural Property in organising and assisting such undertakings as safe-guarding the temples threatened by the Aswan Dam in the Nubian Valley
